name: Avernus
description:
Prosperous, galactic realm of a thousand worlds, ruled by a pantheon of mechanical gods, was brought down to its knees by a sudden and devastating war.
The gods betrayed each other, civilizations turned to dust, and only the smallest fractions of life could survive the aftermath by turning themselves more machine than man.

Eons later mechanized horrors break into a long lost tomb of a dead god, craving after its forbidden powers, bent on creating a demented pantheon of their own.

You take control of a reanimated guardian; who now must brave the ancient halls of his creator, filled with secrets, danger and ruin.Features
  • Responsive, fast-paced and challenging combat that is easy to pick up, but difficult to master.
  • Use a powerful teleportation ability to slip through and between your enemies.
  • Destroy enourmous boss monsters and inherit their game-changing abilities.
  • Take on the tombs dungeons in any order you want and find your own way to beat the game.
  • Explore a lovingly crafted, dark yet vibrant world inspired by ancient Greek, Roman and Egyptian themes.
  • Gain power from defeated enemies or hidden areas and use it to upgrade yourself or burn it away to recover from harm.
